mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.content, b.starCount, b.fileName, b.createDate, u.username FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userid = u.id WHERE u.id = ( SELECT f.followId FROM user u LEFT JOIN follow f ON u.id = f.userId WHERE u.id = #{id}) ORDER BY b.id DESC
